This website provides information on food allergies and intolerances, including symptoms, causes, and treatment options. It explains the difference between food allergy and intolerance, how to identify severe allergic reactions, and offers advice on managing allergies in children. The site also discusses the importance of professional diagnosis and the increase in food allergies worldwide. For more in-depth information, there are videos and resources available. Remember, always seek medical help in case of a severe allergic reaction.
